other_tests.procedure_name: Thirst trial combined with desmopressin infusion
other_tests.findings: Unchanged urinary osmolalities between the start (235 mosmol/kg H2O) and end (229 mosmol/kg H2O) of the treatment.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Urinary osmolalities of 112 and 101 mosmol/kg H2O (trial 1) and 150 and 138 mosmol/kg H2O (trial 2) before and after treatment, respectively.

other_tests.findings: After 3 days of administration, the child did not wet his bed anymore, instead woke up and went to the toilet.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Withdrawal of the medication after 3 months resulted in recurrence of PNE, whereas reintroduction again led to disappearance of PNE.
